name: Hunder
description:
Explore the cave and retrieve its valuable minerals

➤ Hunder's  purpose is to be an homage to the biggest caves in Portugal located in Mira de Aire, with a great focus on a unique  atmosphere.

•  Immerse yourself in the beautiful art of the scenario of the game.

•  Collect the minerals scattered around the cave.

•  Appreciate the geographical place that the game was based off.

•  Enjoy the gorgeus soundtrack.

If you want to checkout our work or contact us, you can do so by following our linktree: https://linktr.ee/lightcavestudios

Controls:

Left mouse click - Walk/Drag

Right mouse click - Interact
